新闻| NME https://www.nme.com/news NME为您带来最新的音乐和流行文化新闻和评论，以及视频和画廊，乐队功能，音乐会门票，杂志，广播等。 THU，2025年2月6日18:19:09 +0000 en-gb小时1 https://wordpress.org/?v=6.7.1 唱片存储日2025：这是发行版的完整列表https://www.nme.com/news/music/record-store-day-2025-full-list-rist-reases-vinyl-3835631?utm_source=rsss＆source = rss＆utm_medium = rsss间释放 - 乙烯基Andrew TrendellThu, 06 Feb 2025 18:00:23 +0000 Music NewsNewsRecord Store Day https://www.nme.com/?p=3835631

请参阅《绿洲》，《夏利XCX》，《弗雷德》的完整列表以及一些最美丽的乙烯基发行。

第2025号邮政记录商店：这是NME上首先出现的发行版列表。

;

唱片商店第2025天的发行版的完整列表已被揭示-独家乙烯基将从Oasis ， Charli XCX ， Fred等乙烯基中删除。请参阅下面的完整列表和一些最美丽的版本。

年度活动将于4月12日返回其第18版，其中数百个独家发行版本以第一个为止的英国和全球数千个独立唱片商店的首次上限提供。

山姆·芬德（Sam Fender）被确认为英国的RSD大使和邮政马龙（Post Malone） ，现在已经分享了发行版的完整列表 - 还包括Beabadoobee ， Rachel Chinouriri ，Rachel Chinouriri， Fuserited Man ，英语老师， Lil Uzi Vert，Lil Uzi Vert ， Megan Thee Stallion，Thee thee Stallion，Theee Stallion，Theee Stallion，Thee thee Stallion， MJ Lenderman和Post Malone ，以及包括公共图像有限公司， Lou Reed ，耶稣和玛丽连锁店等传奇人物。

绿洲是名单上的另一个大牌，为他们的巨大聚会年份热身，并获得了最佳收藏的“ Time Flies…（1994-2009）”，这是Vinyl上首次使用Remastered Audio和全新的包装，并带有盒子套装已编号，包括四个彩色唱片。

诺埃尔·加拉格尔（Noel Gallagher ）说：“当我长大时，唱片店真的很重要。” “这是我的DNA中的东西。我认为，如果我们可以尽可能长时间地开放唱片商店，我们应归功于这个国家的年轻人。”

Fred宣布在RSD 2025上首次在乙烯基上发布“实际生活”钢琴现场会议。我最喜欢做的事情。

“但是我们只为'Al2'和'Al3'创造了钢琴的生活几周前记录了实际生活1'钢琴。我们正在Wit Vinyl Factory（他们做了所有其他IRL乙烯基）生产真正特别的东西。”

列表中的其他亮点包括泰勒·斯威夫特（Taylor Swift “第一天使”的光盘，lou Reed的经典“金属机器”的双银色唱片，金和白色乙烯基上的蜂箱“霸王龙蜂巢”，还有12张“演示”和Air's Seminal's Siminal'Moon Safari'的演示和现场曲目。

RSD在2024年之后的回报率看到乙烯基和物理记录销售额达到20年，尽管“ 地表之下，大多数英国艺术家的收入远低于平均工资”（如FAC报告）。

尽管如此，最近的一份数字娱乐和零售协会报告显示，去年乙烯基记录的市场增长了10.5％，去年售出了670万光盘，产生了1,900万英镑。唱片商店日加上泰勒·斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）的“折磨诗人”的发行，这是2024年30年前每周最高的乙烯基销售。

“每年，我都会问，'什么是唱片商店的日子？'”爱丁堡索恩唱片公司的马克·索恩（Mark Thorne）说。 “我的回答总是，'这就像唱片店的母亲节' - 但我们独立唱片零售商的队列不仅是巧克力和鲜花

“这近20年来一直促进我们行业的一部分，很长一段时间都可以持续。”

查看到目前为止宣布的唱片商店第2025天的完整列表，并在此处访问此处以获取有关RSD的更多信息或查找您最近的参与商店。

; “旅行”正在返回 - 我们发现，因为史蒂夫·库根（Steve Coogan）被抓住了https://www.nme.com/news/tv/the-trip-is-returning-and-we-found-b- of-steve-coogan-was-was-cound-cound-caught-speeding-3835661?utm_source = rsss＆utm_medium = rsssssssssss＆utm_campaigh= Trip-is-Is返回和我发现的b-bb-bb-becogan-was捕获的速度Victoria LuxfordThu, 06 Feb 2025 17:00:16 +0000 NewsTV News https://www.nme.com/?p=3835661

以前以前认为该节目不会回来

“旅行”帖子正在返回 - 我们发现，因为史蒂夫·库根（Steve Coogan）被抓住了超速，首先出现在NME上。

;

史蒂夫·库根（Steve Coogan）透露，通过给伯明翰地方法院的一封信，有一个不寻常的方式计划的第五系列喜剧之旅。

  • 阅读更多：我一生的配乐 - 艾伦·帕特里奇（Alan Partridge）

这位明星在2024年7月以97英里 /小时的速度抓住了速度，他的执照中已经有6个罚球。违规行为有可能看到他签署了驾驶禁令，而艾伦·帕特里奇（Alan Partridge）的创造者则以宽大的态度向当局致辞。

库根（Coogan）在这封信中首次报告的信中写道：“我有一系列计划于2025年进行的重要电影承诺，其中许多涉及驾驶是作品的核心组成部分。我将出现在一部名为The Trip （与Rob Brydon）的公认电视连续剧中，标题表明我需要开车。”

这封信显示，拍摄定于“ 2025年6月底”，库根说：“如果我无法开车，制作可能无法进行”。他认为，除了自己的工作外，“许多依赖这些工作的人”也会受到影响。

他解释说：“其中包括相机，声音和照明技术人员，钻机以及其他工资中的其他工资，他们将面临取消和经济困难，因为重新安排此类项目通常非常复杂。”

报告说，库根“犯了有罪的认罪，并获得了五个罚分，这使他没有面对禁令的一分。他被命令支付2500英镑的罚款，外加90英镑的费用和1,000英镑的受害者附加费。”

这一消息将使粉丝感到惊讶，该节目的导演迈克尔·温特博托姆（Michael Winterbottom）于去年曾被计划延续。 在接受NME的采访时，他说：“我不再有其他旅行。史蒂夫（Steve）和罗布（Rob）一直热衷于美国，但太大了！我认为更好的是更好。威尔士为罗布！但是不，没有更多的旅行”。

尽管库根本人说他想在联合主演罗伯·布赖登（Rob Brydon）的播客上做一个喜剧旅行，但这是他想做的。他说：“我认为肯定会有更多的话要说，因为中年不同于变老。” “我认为我们应该在一次和确定的地方再做一次”。

NME已接触到英国节目的广播公司Sky，以进行评论。

即将到来的系列赛将不会是库根（Coogan）唯一的热门电影，因为这位演员透露了新的艾伦·帕特里奇（Alan Partridge）演出的新名字和严肃的主题。

“旅行”帖子正在返回 - 我们发现，因为史蒂夫·库根（Steve Coogan）被抓住了超速，首先出现在NME上。

; 新的“蓝精灵”电影预告片承诺新的蕾哈娜音乐https://www.nme.com/news/music/new-smurfs-movie-trailer-promises-promises-new-rihanna-music-music-3835717?utm_source = rss＆source = rss＆utm_medium = rss＆utm_medium = rsm_campaign= newew-smurfie-smurfie-smurfsmovie-smurfs-movies-movies-movies-movies-movies-movs-movs-modisises-n-n-n-n-n-n-n-n-n-----------蕾哈娜音乐Liberty DunworthThu, 06 Feb 2025 16:51:45 +0000 Film NewsMusic NewsNewsPopR&B https://www.nme.com/?p=3835717

它还看到她的表演1987年流行经典“天堂是地球上的地方”的封面

新的“ Smurfs”电影预告片承诺新的Rihanna音乐首次出现在NME上。

;

这部新蓝精灵电影的预告片已经下降了，它似乎可以承诺蕾哈娜（Rihanna）的新音乐。在下面查看。

  • 阅读更多：蕾哈娜（Rihanna）：每张专辑都排名和评分

今天（2月5日）共享，新的预告片是在2023年的新闻中出现的，这位流行歌星将在即将到来的大片中扮演蓝精灵的角色。

在预告片开始之前，看到蕾哈娜（Rihanna）在相机上说话，介绍自己和她在电影中的角色，并告诉观众她“等不及”让他们在夏天在电影院看电影。

从那里开始，它以原始蓝精灵主题曲和早期蕾哈娜（Rihanna）热门歌曲“不要停止音乐”的混搭开始，然后过渡到1987年流行音乐经典的蕾哈娜（Rihanna）封面'天堂是地球上的一个地方'贝琳达·卡莱尔（Belinda Carlisle）。后者似乎还具有DJ Khaled的外观。

“在蓝精灵村，每天都是聚会，” Ri在画外音中说。 “每个蓝精灵都有一份工作 - 像Grouchy，有影响力的人和我一样，是整个村庄中最酷的蓝精灵。”

According to the trailer, the plot seems to be centred around a number of Smurfs embarking on a long journey into different dimensions to find the missing Papa Smurf – voiced by John Goodman. Other actors contributing their voices to the film include Nick Offerman, Natasha Lyonne, Nick Kroll, James Corden and Amy Sedaris.

It is set to arrive in cinemas on July 18. Check out the trailer below.

As well as taking on one of the leading roles in the film and providing music for the trailer, it looks like Rihanna will also be using the blockbuster to drop some long-awaited new material.

According to a report from Variety , Rihanna is one of the producers of the movie and has also written multiple original songs for it.

More details about the new tracks are expected to be shared closer to the film's release date.

The trailer and hopes for new music comes just days after the singer took to social media to celebrate nine years since the release of her last studio album, 'Anti' . She has yet to release another album since then, but has gone on to drop two standalone songs. The most recent of which was the 2022 song 'Lift Me Up' – the lead track to the Black Panther: Wakanda Forever soundtrack and a tribute to late actor Chadwick Boseman .

Fans have been anticipating a new LP – currently dubbed 'R9' by fans – since 2018, when the singer started dropping hints. These included a lighthearted post of a dog dancing alongside the caption: “Me listening to R9 by myself and refusing to release it.”

While hopes were high in 2019, the following year she dismissed them by telling fans to stop asking her to release new material during the pandemic . By 2023, Entertainment Tonight claimed that Rihanna was planning her musical return by signing a deal with Live Nation and looking to go on a world tour from 2024-2025 . This has yet to materialise.

By December 2023, Rihanna fanned the flames from ET and told a reporter on a red carpet that there may be new music and a world tour on the horizon . Once again, this lost momentum just two months later when her partner A$AP Rocky said that the singer was still “working on” the long-awaited record.

Although Ri has kept her cards close to her chest about new music, she did recently address her future in the music industry at a Fenty launch party, explaining that the long holdup for new material comes because “God had other plans for me.”

The forthcoming role in the Smurfs film will be far from her first acting role, as she has already starred in projects including Battleship , Home and Ocean's 8 .

; Mumford & Sons announce intimate 2025 nine-date club tour of UK, Europe, Australia and North America https://www.nme.com/news/music/mumford-sons-intimate-2025-club-tour-uk-europe-australia-north-america-buy-tickets-3835687?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=mumford-sons-intimate-2025-club-tour-uk-europe-australia-north-america-buy-ticketsAnagricel Duran Thu, 06 Feb 2025 16:49:56 +0000 Music NewsNewsFolkIndieLive Music NewsRock https://www.nme.com/?p=3835687

The shows come ahead of the release of the band's album 'RUSHMERE'

The post Mumford & Sons announce intimate 2025 nine-date club tour of UK, Europe, Australia and North America appeared first on NME .

;

Mumford & Sons have shared the details of an intimate nine-date club tour of UK, Europe, Australia and North America, set to kick off in March.

The newly announced gigs will mark Marcus Mumford and co's first string of headline live dates in the UK and Europe since 2018. The band will commence the tour on March 5 at Melkweg in Amsterdam. From there, they will make stops in Paris, London, Sydney, Los Angeles, Chicago and Toronto before wrapping up the shows at Brooklyn Paramount in New York on March 26.

Those who are members of Agora – the band's fan community – will have access to a ticket pre-sale available for the community members starting Thursday February 13. Anyone interested in the pre-sale should register for Agora here before Monday (February 10) at 11:59pm GMT.

General ticket sales will commence on Friday February 14 at 10am local time. Check out a full list of dates below and visit here to purchase UK tickets, here for US tickets.

在Instagram上查看此帖子

A post shared by Mumford & Sons (@mumfordandsons)

Mumford & Sons 2025 intimate club tour dates are:

行进
5 – Amsterdam, NL, Melkweg
7 – Paris, FR, Elysee Montmatre
9 – Berlin, DE—Metropol
11 – London, UK, O2 Forum Kentish Town
17 – Sydney, AU, Sydney Opera House
20 – Los Angeles, CA, Hollywood Palladium
22 – Chicago, IL, The Chicago Theatre
23 – Toronto, ON, Allied Music Centre – Massey Hall
26 – New York, NY, Brooklyn Paramount

Mumford & Sons have also partnered with PLUS1 to support War Child . $1 from every ticket sold will help War Child to protect, educate, and stand up for the rights of children affected by war.

Last month, the band shared their comeback track 'RUSHMERE' from their forthcoming album of the same name . It will mark their first LP in seven years and will be released on March 28 via Island/Glassnote, following on from 2018's 'Delta' ( pre-order/pre-save here ).

'RUSHMERE' also marks Mumford & Sons' first album as a trio, comprising of frontman Marcus Mumford, Ted Dwane and Ben Lovett. Banjoist Winston Marshall departed the group in 2021 , after facing backlash for praising a book by right-wing US journalist Andy Ngo .

Accoridng to a press release, Rushmere is the spot where it all began for the band. The pond, located on Wimbledon Common in south-west London, is where Mumford, Lovett, and Dwane first hung out and imagined the initial idea of putting a band together. Rushmere was as familiar to them as the instruments they played, and is at the heart of their origin story.

在Instagram上查看此帖子

A post shared by Mumford & Sons (@mumfordandsons)

Produced by nine-time Grammy award winner Dave Cobb, 'RUSHMERE' follows an intense period of creativity for the trio and was recorded at RCA Studio A in Nashville, in Savannah, GA, and back in the UK at Marcus' studio in Devon.

Other songs set to appear on the album are 'Malibou', 'Monochrome', 'Truth' and 'Blood On The Page', the latter of which features Californian singer-songwriter Madison Cunningham. Their Pharrell-featuring 2024 song ' Good People' does not appear on the tracklist.

Speaking about the prospect of releasing new material in an interview in early 2024, Lovett said: “It just feels so great to be sharing new music again after all these years.”

Mumford added: “I think we always felt like we knew we were going to release some more music, but we wanted to wait for the right music. We've never been in haste, I don't think. But when this music came around, we had a sense of urgency.”

Dwane explained that they had “a lot of songs kicking around” at the time, and said the group were “really excited”.

In other news, Mumford & Sons are set to join forces with the likes of David Byrne , Jack White , Chris Martin and Lady Gaga in celebration of 50 years of Saturday Night Live as part of SNL: The Homecoming Concert at Radio City Hall, New York .

; 'The Simpsons' actor Hank Azaria expects AI will replace him soon: “It makes me sad to think about” https://www.nme.com/news/tv/the-simpsons-actor-hank-azaria-expects-ai-will-replace-him-soon-it-makes-me-sad-to-think-about-3835712?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=the-simpsons-actor-hank-azaria-expects-ai-will-replace-him-soon-it-makes-me-sad-to-think-aboutVictoria Luxford Thu, 06 Feb 2025 16:43:27 +0000 NewsTV News https://www.nme.com/?p=3835712

“A voice is not just a sound”

The post 'The Simpsons' actor Hank Azaria expects AI will replace him soon: “It makes me sad to think about” appeared first on NME .

;

The Simpsons voice actor Hank Azaria has written about his fears about being replaced by AI, and how the art of voice acting is much more than replicating a sound.

  • READ MORE: Five surprising secrets we learned from the 1995 'Simpsons' sketches

In an op-ed for The New York Times , Azaria, who voices bartender Moe, Chief Wiggum, and Comic Book Guy among other characters on the show, talked of his sadness that his years of work on the show may result in AI taking over从他那里。

He wrote: “I imagine that soon enough, artificial intelligence will be able to recreate the sounds of the more than 100 voices I created for characters on The Simpsons over almost four decades. It makes me sad to think about it. Not to mention, it seems just plain wrong to steal my likeness or sound — or anyone else's”.

He used the example of Moe as an example: “AI could have access to 36 years of Moe, the permanently disgruntled bartender. He's appeared in just about every episode of The Simpsons . He's been terrified, in love, hit in the head and, most often, in a state of bitter hatred. I've laughed as Moe in dozens of ways by now. I've probably sighed as Moe 100 times. In terms of training AI, that's a lot to work with”.

He went on to say that, despite these resources, the human element of vocal performance is what makes the characters unique. “A voice is not just a sound” he says. “I'd like to think that no matter how much an AI version of Moe or Snake or Chief Wiggum will sound like my voice, something will still be missing — the humanness. There's so much of who I am that goes into creating a voice”.

He also mentioned the physical aspects of his work on the show, saying: “A misconception about voice acting is that it takes only a voice. But our bodies and souls are involved to get the proper believability. It can be as simple as running in place if your character's running. If your character is crying, you work up real tears, real emotion”.

Despite his sadness, Azaria concluded his piece on an optimistic note. “It's the neck-up version that I can see AI being capable of, at least right now” he said. “The body and soul part will be harder”.

Last year, Azaria went on the road performing with his Bruce Springsteen tribute act, Hank Azaria & The EZ Street Band . Prior to that, he also commented on when he felt The Simpsons would end.

  • READ MORE: Sharon Osbourne and Tony Iommi tell us about Black Sabbath's finale: “Usually this thing is done when you're dead”

Yesterday (February 5), Black Sabbath announced their final-ever live show, which will take place in Birmingham on July 5 . The band has also announced star-studded opening acts and special guests, which include the likes of Metallica , Slayer , Pantera , Lamb Of God , Mastodon , Alice In Chains , Halestorm, recent Grammy -winners Gojira and more.

Sleep Token were one of the acts in the massive line-up announced. In a rare note – considering that the band never really do interviews – the band's drummer II has shared a statement about the gig on his official Instagram account.

“It is with reverence and great honour that I announce my participation in paying tribute to the legendary @blacksabbath at Villa Park Stadium. Taking place upon the hallowed grounds of Birmingham, UK on Saturday, July 5th, 2025,” he wrote.

He continued: “A band whom from the beginning ignited my passion for heavy music and creation at its core. Eternal gratitude to @ozzyosbourne @sharonosbourne @tommorello and @andycoppingofficial for their gracious consideration.”

The Black Sabbath gig will see the iconic original line-up of Ozzy Osbourne, guitarist Iommi, bassist Geezer Butler and drummer Bill Ward on stage. The show will mark their first time playing live together in two decades, and come as the very last performance from the band and frontman.所有利润将捐给慈善机构Cure Parkinson's，伯明翰儿童医院和Acorn Children's Hospice，这是由阿斯顿维拉（Aston Villa）支持的儿童临终关怀医院。

Speaking to NME shortly after the announcement of the final Black Sabbath gig at Villa Park , Sharon Osbourne said that the band's legacy was too profound for them to ever really be gone.

“你不能说再见，”奥兹的妻子和经理告诉NME 。 “看看他们留下的东西 - 这是他们留给世界的巨大，伟大的工作。只要您有的话，它就永远不会再见。它是为了永恒的。”

Sharon also revealed that the day is “a celebration – of the genre and the pioneers who started it and passed it on to all these bands.通常，当您死了时，这件事就完成了 - 因此，这些家伙能够被感激！”

; 'Napoleon Dynamite' wouldn't have been successful if it was released today, say stars https://www.nme.com/news/film/napoleon-dynamite-wouldnt-have-been-successful-if-it-was-released-today-say-stars-3835627?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=napoleon-dynamite-wouldnt-have-been-successful-if-it-was-released-today-say-starsVictoria Luxford Thu, 06 Feb 2025 15:27:35 +0000 Film NewsNews https://www.nme.com/?p=3835627

This film was surprise hit in 2004

The post 'Napoleon Dynamite' wouldn't have been successful if it was released today, say stars appeared first on NME .

;

The stars of '00s cult hit Napoleon Dynamite have said the film wouldn't have been as popular if it was released today.

  • READ MORE: The 100 greatest comedies of all time have been revealed

The film's lead, Jon Heder, as well as co-stars Efren Ramirez (Pedro), and Jon Gries (Uncle Rico) spoke to Indiewire during an ongoing Napoleon Dynamite Live show that the trio have been touring since 2018.

Released in 2004, Napoleon Dynamite was an unlikely independent hit, telling the offbeat story of misfits living in a small town. Napoleon's climactic dance, catchphrases, and “Vote For Pedro” t-shirts have all become memes in the following years. Despite this success, the actors believe the film wouldn't have been the success it was in the modern Hollywood ecosystem.

Gries remarked: “If it were released today, Napoleon Dynamite might not have survived. Theatre owners kept it in theatres. It was six, eight, 10 weeks before the film finally caught fire. I don't think they'd do that now”. Ramirez went further, commenting: “It might go straight to streaming”.

Heder described how touched he is by people's affection for the movie over 20 years on, saying: “People tell us they truly love this film… They grew up on it.

“With the tour, we get a lot of the same questions, and we're telling a lot of the same stories — but you have a new audience every time, and that keeps it fresh for us. If this was a cruddy movie we weren't proud of, it would be a cash grab. But we really love this movie”.

Despite this affection, a sequel for the film has never made it to production. Heder has reprised the role for a commercial with Ramirez, and the cast came back for a short-lived animated series in 2012. There were rumours of a sequel to the film in 2016, with Heder saying: “It could happen. I feel that the stories of Napoleon aren't complete”, although nothing came to fruition.

The closest thing to a sequel would be a virtual reunion in 2020, as part of a charity livestream that raised money for The Hunger Project .

The post 'Napoleon Dynamite' wouldn't have been successful if it was released today, say stars appeared first on NME .

; Nick Cave, PJ Harvey, Devo and more featured on 'Los Angeles Rising' wildfire relief benefit compilation album https://www.nme.com/news/music/nick-cave-pj-harvey-devo-and-more-featured-on-los-angeles-rising-wildfire-relief-benefit-compilation-album-3835608?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=nick-cave-pj-harvey-devo-and-more-featured-on-los-angeles-rising-wildfire-relief-benefit-compilation-albumAnagricel Duran Thu, 06 Feb 2025 15:03:50 +0000 Music NewsNewsIndiePopRock https://www.nme.com/?p=3835608

“This harrowing experience and witnessing the monumental destruction of entire communities, inspired Nick and I to team up to create a compilation album to raise money for the less fortunate"

The post Nick Cave, PJ Harvey, Devo and more featured on 'Los Angeles Rising' wildfire relief benefit compilation album appeared first on NME .

;

Nick Cave , PJ Harvey , Devo and more have been announced as contributors featured on the 'Los Angeles Rising' wildfire relief benefit compilation album.

  • READ MORE: LA wildfires: How thousands of music professionals are being supported by charity

The Los Angeles wildfires, which began on January 7, have left 28 people dead, more than 12,000 structures destroyed and saw the evacuation of more than 150,000 residents.

Created by Kevin Haskins ( Love and Rockets , Bauhaus ) and producer Nick Launay (Nick Cave, Yeah Yeah Yeahs , IDLES ), all proceeds from 'Los Angeles Rising' will go to Sweet Relief – a musicians fund that helps provide financial assistance to musicians and music industry workers. You can purchase the album exclusively from Bandcamp .

The LP features 16 previously unreleased tracks from the likes of Cave, Harvey, Gary Numan , Primal Scream and more. 'Los Angeles Rising' also includes an alternative take on Yeah Yeah Yeah's 2006 release 'Turn Into Redux' as well as a stripped-back rendition of The Mamas and The Papa's iconic track 'California Dreamin' by Jarvis Cocker which was recorded back in 2020. You can check out Cocker's cover below.

Speaking about the creation of the compilation album in a press release, Haskins said: “As the wildfires were raging and destroying thousands of homes around Los Angeles, both my neighbourhood and Nick's were instructed to evacuate. But we were the lucky ones. The fire threatening our homes and recording studios was thankfully extinguished by firefighters just minutes away, but countless musicians and friends lost everything.”

Launay added: “This harrowing experience and witnessing the monumental destruction of entire communities, inspired Nick and I to team up to create a compilation album to raise money for the less fortunate. We reached out to our musician friends for unreleased recorded gems and the response was incredible! PJ Harvey, Nick Cave, Jarvis Cocker, Primal Scream, Gary Numan and Devo are just some of the artists that rushed in to help”.

'Lost Angeles Rising' tracklist is:

1. PJ Harvey with Danni Bensi and Saunder Jurriaans – 'The Red River'
2. Grinderman – 'Worm Tamer' – LaunayVauz Remix
3. Gary Numan and Titan – 'Dark Rain'
4. Yeah Yeah Yeahs – 'Turn Into Redux'
5. Band Of Skulls – 'Cold Cold Sweat' – LaunayVauz Remix
6. Jarvis Cocker – 'California Dreamin''
7. Primal Scream – 'False Flags' – Orchestral version
8. Nick Cave and The Bad Seeds – 'Michelangelo'
9. Haskins, Vandermolen and Lohner – 'All We Ever Wanted Was Everything'
10. Danny Elfman – 'Monkeys On The Loose' – LA Rising version
11. Devo – 'Shoulda Said Yes'
12. Siobhan Fahey and Titan – 'Deep In LA'
13. CRX – 'Blip On The Radar'
14. David J – 'No New Tale To Tell' – Original demo version
15. Flea, Frusciante, Haskins and DeAngelis – 'A System For Shutting Everything Out'
16. US Girls – 'Four American Dollars' – Demo version

Elsewhere, a study recently shared by World Weather Attribution , claimed that the LA wildfires were made “more likely” by human-caused climate change . The study said that the hot, dry and windy conditions that drove fires in the Californian city were “35 per cent more likely due to warming caused primarily by the burning of oil, gas and coal.”

In other news, Big Thief have recently announced their new charity EP 'Passion Relation' which will help raise funds for those who were affected by the LA Wildfires .

The Geese frontman will play two intimate London gigs this spring

The post Cameron Winter announces 'Heavy Metal Tour Continued' shows in UK, France and US appeared first on NME .

;

Cameron Winter has announced new headline solo shows in the UK, France and the US. Find all the details below.

  • READ MORE: Geese's Cameron Winter talks debut solo album 'Heavy Metal': “I don't care about what anyone expects or wants from me”

The Geese frontman is due to hit the road in the States next week in support of his debut solo album 'Heavy Metal' , which was released last December.

Now, the Brooklyn artist has shared details of the 'Heavy Metal Tour Continued' this spring. On this leg, Winter will take to the stage in Baltimore (April 17), Boston (19) and New York (22).

He'll then head to the UK for a pair of intimate headline gigs at St Matthias Church in North London on April 24 and 25. The musician will follow this performance with a show at La Halles Aux Oliviers in Paris on April 29.

A press release said of the latter three dates: “The atmospheric venues are the perfect environment to experience the album live for the first time and for Cameron to showcase his eclectic influences and surreal mosaic of modern songwriting and storytelling.”

Tickets are on general sale now – you can buy yours here . Check out the announcement post below.

在Instagram上查看此帖子

A post shared by @mrcameron_winter

Cameron Winter's new 'Heavy Metal Tour Continued' 2025 dates are:

四月
17 – 2640 Space Baltimore
19 – 4th Wall, Boston
22 – St John's Lutheran Church, New York
24 – St Matthias Church, London
25 – St Matthias Church, London
29 – La Halles Aux Oliviers, Paris

Speaking to NME last November , Winter explained that his musical inspiration came partly from his “traumatic childhood”, and discussed the differences between creating solo work and making music with Geese.

“Well, some parts are easier and some parts are harder,” he said. “With Geese, when you're working on full songs with multiple people, the songs themselves have to have certain beats that everyone understands and knows and can revolve around whereas, when I was doing it myself, I would sort of just throw all that窗外。

“For Geese songs, I'm really prepared and for this, I was not prepared, which made things more difficult.”

Winter continued: “I was just like, 'I don't have to teach these things to anyone. I could just figure it out on my own and it could all exist in my head', and led to something that was that's a little more impressionistic, than a lot of the Geese stuff, which ended up being fine, but was also really fucking压力很大。

“A lot of these songs sucked for a long time due to me not writing them before I recorded them. There was a lot of reverse-engineering from just like me banging on a piano. I had to make the songs out of that and you can kind of hear it on the record. Everything's stitched together and kind of weird.”

In other news, Geese covered Television's 'Marquee Moon' and Green Day's 'American Idiot' during their annual Geesefest residency in NYC last December.

Geese starred on NME 's The Cover last year , where they spoke about their versatile approach to creating music.
